 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרַד‎</span>] **verb** ==rebel== (Late Hebrew ***id,***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be bold and audacious in acts of rebellion or disobedience***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***run strenuously, attack***; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***rebellion***, [[BDB#Prä|Prä]]<sup>Beiträge iii. 44</sup>; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרד‎</span> ***rebellion*** [[BDB#Hal|Hal]]<sup>535,16</sup> [[BDB#SabDenkm|SabDenkm]]<sup>38</sup> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chrestom. 127</sup>; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְרַד‎</span>; ***rebel***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרָ֑ד‎</span> [[2Chr.36.13|2Chr 36:13]], 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרַדְתָּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.20|2Kgs 18:20]] = [[Isa.36.5|Isa 36:5]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְרֹד‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.7|2Kgs 18:7]] + 3 t., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּמְרָדֿ‎</span> [[2Kgs.24.1|2Kgs 24:1]]; [[Ezek.17.15|Ezek 17:15]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְרֹד‎</span> [[Josh.22.29|Josh 22:29]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִמְרוֺד‎</span> [[Neh.6.6|Neh 6:6]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרְדִים‎</span> [[Neh.2.19|Neh 2:19]]; [[Ezek.20.38|Ezek 20:38]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מוֺ‎</span> [[Ezek.2.3|Ezek 2:3]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרדי‎</span> [[Job.24.13|Job 24:13]] — ***rebel, revolt:*** 

**1.** against human king, approximately <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> person [[2Kgs.18.7|2Kgs 18:7]]; [[2Kgs.18.20|2Kgs 18:20]] = [[Isa.36.5|Isa 36:5]]; [[2Kgs.24.1|2Kgs 24:1]]; [[2Kgs.24.20|2Kgs 24:20]] = [[Jer.52.3|Jer 52:3]], compare [[Ezek.17.15|Ezek 17:15]]; [[2Chr.36.13|2Chr 36:13]]; [[Neh.9.26|Neh 9:26]] less often (late) with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> person [[2Chr.13.6|2Chr 13:6]]; [[Neh.2.19|Neh 2:19]] absolute [[Gen.14.4|Gen 14:4]]; [[Neh.6.6|Neh 6:6]]. 

**2.** against God, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Num.14.9|Num 14:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Josh.22.16|Josh 22:16]]; [[Josh.22.18|Josh 22:18]]; [[Josh.22.19|Josh 22:19]]; [[Josh.22.29|Josh 22:29]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), [[Ezek.2.3|Ezek 2:3]] ([[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָרוּ‎</span>), [[Dan.9.9|Dan 9:9]] absolute [[Ezek.2.3|Ezek 2:3]] (participle, [[BDB#Co|Co]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מורים‎</span>), [[Ezek.20.38|Ezek 20:38]]; [[Dan.9.5|Dan 9:5]]. 

**3.** in poetry, ==against light only== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹרְדֵי אוֺר‎</span> [[Job.24.13|Job 24:13]].
